title: $30 -- 'Buddy: The Buddy Holly Story' in Toronto, 40% Off
text:
Thank you for updating your zip code Lower Ossington Theatre 
Acclaimed musical "Buddy: The Buddy Holly Story" is coming to ­Toronto ­this fall, and tickets are 40% off for Travelzoo members .­ 
The following seating levels are available for all performances Sept. 10­ - Oct. 25 at the­ Lower Ossington Theatre: Reserved ... $29.99 (reg. $49.99) Premium ... $35.99 (reg. $59.99) Floor ... $41.99 (reg. $69.99) 
"Buddy" tells the story of the young rock musician's rise to fame before his tragic death in a plane crash at just 22 years old. The jukebox musical features classic songs such as "Peggy Sue" and "That'll Be the Day." The New York Times raves about the show's "golden oldies pounded out the way they used to be." 'Buddy: The Buddy Holly Story' in Toronto, $ $30 Select dates Sept. 10 ­- Oct. 25 $30 -- 'Buddy: The Buddy Holly Story' in Toronto, 40% Off * Tweet By Pamela Bartlett 
Acclaimed musical "Buddy: The Buddy Holly Story" is coming to ­Toronto ­this fall, and tickets are 40% off for Travelzoo members .­ 
The following seating levels are available for all performances Sept. 10­ - Oct. 25 at the­ Lower Ossington Theatre: Reserved ... $29.99 (reg. $49.99) Premium ... $35.99 (reg. $59.99) Floor ... $41.99 (reg. $69.99) 
"Buddy" tells the story of the young rock musician's rise to fame before his tragic death in a plane crash at just 22 years old. The jukebox musical features classic songs such as "Peggy Sue" and "That'll Be the Day." The New York Times raves about the show's "golden oldies pounded out the way they used to be." Book by Oct. 24. How to book Click here to book online at Lower Ossington Theatre Select a performance date and time then click "Find Tickets." Code TZBUDDY will be automatically applied. Choose a ticket quantity and seating section and click "Get Tickets." Click "Checkout" and follow the prompts to purchase. 
Fees : Additional fees of $11.75-$17.05 per ticket will apply. *Terms/Conditions: Additional fees of $11.75-$17.05 per ticket will apply. Fees are determined by the venue and ticketing agent and not by Travelzoo. Full-price tickets are subject to the same fees. Restrictions may apply. Like this deal?
